pages.title: Foliot Crusher
pages.text: The foliot crusher is a spirit summoned to crush ores into dusts, effectively doubling the metal output. It will pick up appropriate ores and drop the resulting dusts into the world. A purple particle effect and a crushing sound indicate the crusher is at work. To ease automation, try summoning a $(l:rituals/summoning/summon_cleaner)Janitor Spirit$(/l).

pages.title: Djinni Crusher
pages.text: The djinni crusher is both more resistant to essence decay and faster than the foliot crusher.

pages.title: Afrit Crusher
pages.text: The afrit crusher is both more resistant to essence decay and faster than the djinni crusher.

pages.title: Marid Crusher
pages.text: The marid crusher is both more resistant to essence decay and faster than the marid crusher.
